story_26_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: Maravilloso! It looks like the machine works!
story_26_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Look at all these sync pairs! This is just perfect!
story_26_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
My Pokémon can’t wait to battle! Won’t you battle
with us?
story_26_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
But our machine called them here! They must be
strong sync pairs!
